website_summaries.verdict: The PSB M4U 1 delivers first-class audiophile sound at home or on-the-go with your mobile device.
pros: The PSB M4U 1 offers excellent, clean, and accurate sound
The headphones fit comfortably and come with both a "plain" cable and one that has an integrated one-button remote and microphone for making cell-phone calls
A nice carrying case and an extra set of user-replaceable ear pads are also included
cons: Like most hinged headphones, the M4U 1's hinges might pose long-term reliability concerns
The headphones high performance can make poorly recorded and compressed music (MP3s) sound worse

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Love them. There's no doubt these headphones SOUND better than any Beats or Bose headphone I've ever used. However, I am not so sure they are BUILT better than Beats or Bose. As much as I love these headphones, I don't use them very often. So imagine my surprise after 5 months of very infrequent use, one of the headphones fell off the headband right at the hinge. PSB requires that you go through the vendor for any returns, so I called Audio Advisor and requested an RMA. They were quick to answer and quick to respond. Hopefully the headphones that I get back will last longer than 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee Mullins

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed with the manufacturing quality of my pair
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with the manufacturing quality of my pair. The headphone cable did not work fresh out of the box. I have a half dozen jacks laying around unsued, so that did not really bother me. However, about a year after purchase the right speaker began shorting with increasing frequency, and eventually no longer worked. The sound on these things was great for the price until it turned to early retirement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable for long listening session
customer_reviews.text: They sound amazing--to me that is by far the most important thing. They are very comfortable for long listening session. The only possible issue is the tactile feel. They are a bit too plasticky for the price, but that is a nit pick. Overall, superb sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding closed-back, over the ear, non noise cancelling corded headphones available
customer_reviews.text: These are really great headphones, very accurate, great at high volume, very detailed, but not cold sounding either. Very high quality construction, comfortable, even with my fat head and eyeglasses. I generally use them with an iPhone 6 plus on a commuter train, FYI. I have tried many many over the ear headphones, these are by far the best for my use case. If you want the best sounding, over the ear, non-noise cancelling, corded headphones this is your ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Frank

customer_reviews.title: Works with PlayStation 4
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a PS4 headset! Game audio sounds great, and chat audio works with no static for others. Discovering this, in addition to my music listening, I'm really glad I made the purchase after the recommendation from The Wirecutter.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband's birthday - he loves them! Great sound quality. He did a lot of research before picking these ones, and the research paid off. They are great high quality, over the ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Nabu

customer_reviews.title: ... have had these about a year and am very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I have had these about a year and am very happy with them. The sound is very good and the fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound. I have a big head, though ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound. I have a big head, though, and feel a little clamped down after extended time periods wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Murchison

customer_reviews.title: ... anything but I will say these headphones have the best audio quality of any I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a seasoned audiophile or anything but I will say these headphones have the best audio quality of any I've ever tried. That's the good. The bad is that for someone with a fairly large head like myself they are a bit tight and uncomfortable. I think the tight seal it makes around the ear combined with the tight fit makes a fair amount of air pressure on the ear canal. They also look a bit awkward when I wear them (for me at least). The folding hinge makes me nervous about its durability, but I havnt had any problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Bacus

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've always used ear buds so I don't have much to compare with audio quality wise, but these sound great. The travel case is great. The switchable left/right cable is awesome. I wanted something I could use on trips and travel that wouldn't make me look like one of those no value flashy idiots with cartoonish Beats headphones. These accomplish that. They fold up nicely. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Istre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: These cans received good reviews from the experts so thought I would give them try. I am not disappointed. Good, clear sound and comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Left channel DOA
customer_reviews.text: The headphones I received had the left channel dead on arrival. And for the 5 minutes I had these on my head, they were already hot and slightly uncomfortable, so I'm glad I'm returning for a refund. Also, the hinges seem not too durable, and the plastic around the ear cups on the outside was slightly scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Par4dox

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, never distorts.
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to hear all my music again through these! I can hear so much more detail in every single piece.
customer_reviews.author: Luc

customer_reviews.title: There are a lot of things to like about these headphones
customer_reviews.text: If I had not received these as a gift I would have taken them back. There are a lot of things to like about these headphones, unfortunately the deal breaker is the microphonics from the cord. Unless you sit totally still the cord noise overpowers the music at lower volumes. (if you can sit totally still these cans do sound quite good) I wish I could use an aftermarket cord, or PSB would at the very least include a cord clip
customer_reviews.author: pen_name

product_meta.title: PSB M4U-1 Gray M4U 1 High Performance Over-Ear Headphones Gray
product_meta.description: The M4U 1 offers PSB's Room Feel(TM) acoustic technology with Two tangle-free cords and convenient remote and stereo monitor controls with mic for iPhone and Black. Has a unique dual input connection (left or right) and Comfort Fit Gyro-suspended. Comes with self-adjusting replaceable ear pads and can be easily folded for travel and storage
feature_bullets: Two tangle-free cords and convenient remote and stereo monitor controls with mic for iPhone and Black
Unique dual input Connection (left or right)
Comfort fit gyro-suspended, self-adjusting replaceable ear pads
Easy folding for travel and storage
Frequency Response - LF Cutoff -10dB - 10Hz to 20kHz, LF Cutoff -3dB - 15Hz to 20kHz and Within ±1.5dB - 20Hz to 20,000Hz and Impedance - 32 Ohms

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars48 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
